This is blurry, Fact. 4 different players, over half screen and it's really blurry and obviously low quality. Take this torrent down.

If you check the video bitrate, it's 1000-1200-something kbps, mostly around 1100-1200, whereas the previous episode had an average of 1422 kbps.
Last ep was also 471 MiB, whereas this is only 402. Both are 42:31 long.
I will have to agree, this ep is way below standard. It's mostly watchable, but blurry in many places. For example, from 19:30 to 21:20, it's quite bad.
